hanzi-su-wiki:
湾

Значения

Залив, бухта, гавань

Мнемоника

Залив, поверхность воды 氵 в котором укрыта от штормов и походит также 亦 на изогнутый лук 弓.

Варианты

灣
purpleculture_pinyin:
wān
bay; gulf; to cast anchor; to moor (a boat)
залив; залив; бросить якорь; пришвартоваться (лодка)
rtega_mnemonic:
灣灣RS
湾湾		bay, cove, inlet, bend of stream
  • bent 彎/弯 water 氵
  • wet man with bow 弯 coming out of the water 氵: attack in a bay
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 灣)
Pictophonetic: 弯 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
台湾 [ tái wān ]: Taiwan
海湾 [ hǎi wān ]: (Persian) Gulf
海湾 [ hǎi wān ]: bay; gulf
港湾 [ gǎng wān ]: natural harbor; bay serving as harbor
田湾 [ tián wān ]: Tianwan in Lianyungang 连云港 , site of large nuclear power plant
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 弯 [ wān ] bend, curve, turn
heisig_chinese_memo: In his most daring feat, William tell used his bow to shoot an apple off the head of his son across the water of the bay.
heisig_constituent: gulf, water, water droplets, water pistol, apple, bow
koohiiStory1: In his most daring feat, William tell used his bow to shoot an apple off the head of his son across the water of the gulf.
koohiiStory2: An army of archers must cross a gulf of water. Fortunately there are millions of apple trees growing in the cliffs above the gulf. The archers use their bows to shoot down apple after apple, which all fall into the water and slowly fill up the the gulf until the archer soliders can cross on foot.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami dug out a chunk of the land and now it looks like a big red bow. It's a gulf now!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture all the famous gulfs you learned about in geography class. Most of them look like someone pressed a bow into them and dug out the land. (And just imagine they're red because the earth is bleeding, making the sand red.)
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: How many tsunamis does it take to make a gulf? Just one (わん). If there were more, then no land would be left behind. It would all be taken into the sea.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch one tsunami come in and cut out a chunk of land, leaving behind a big, red gulf.

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the curving (弯) water (氵) is in the gulf
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In his most daring feat, William tell used his bow to shoot an apple off the head of his son across the water of the bay.

湾字的基本解释

湾
（灣）
wān
水流弯曲的地方：河湾。
海岸凹入陆地、便于停船的地方：海湾。港湾。
使船停住：把船湾住。

湾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wān］
［《廣韻》烏關切，平删，影。］
“湾1”的繁体字。
(1)水流弯曲处。
(2)海湾。
(3)停泊。
(4)量词。多用于小水。
(5)同“彎”。弯曲。
(6)用于村庄等地名。

湾字的英文翻译

◎ 湾
bay, gulf, sinus

湾字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灣； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页639第11
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】烏關切【正韻】烏還切，?音彎。水曲也。【沈佺期詩】舟險萬重灣。　又【韻補】叶于權切，音淵。【白居易·悟眞寺詩】去山四五里，先聞水潺湲。自兹拾車馬，始涉藍溪灣。

湾字的源字形

湾字的起名意思

：1、水流弯曲的地方：河湾； 2、海岸凹入陆地、便于停船的地方：海湾。港湾。

Bay
Basic explanation of words
Bay
(Bay)
wān
The place where the water flows: the river bend.
A place where the coast is recessed into the land and is convenient for stopping ships: the bay. Harbor.
To stop the boat: to park the boat in the bay.
Bay
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wān］
["Guangyun" Wu caring, flat deletion, shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "湾1".
(1) Bend of water flow.
(2) The bay.
(3) Parked.
(4) Quantifiers. Mostly used for small water.
(5) Same as "bend". bending.
(6) Used for place names such as villages.

Water song also. 【Shen Quanqi Poems】The boat is in danger of Wanzhongwan.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye Yu Quanqie, Yinyuan. 【Bai Juyi·Wu Sui Temple Poem】Go to the mountain for four or five miles, and first smell the rushing water. Since I picked up the carts and horses, I began to wade into Blue Creek Bay.
Bay
Source glyph
Bay
Name meaning
:1. The place where the water flow is curved: the river bay; 2. The place where the coast is recessed into the land and is convenient for stopping the ship: the bay. Harbor.
湾
会意字。从?(水),古文字形体像水流;从彎(弯),弯指弯曲,表示水流弯曲处是湾;彎(弯wan )兼表声。灣简化为
湾。本义是水道弯曲处。
①水流弯曲的地方:水~1河~。②海洋伸人陆地的部
分:港~「渤海~。③使船停住:把船~在桥边。
~流 ~泊 ~塘 港~海~沙~ 台~
wān
灣
灣湾
залив
Зная слово.
Cong? (水), древние иероглифы подобны потоку воды; Congwan (изгиб), изгиб означает изгиб, что означает, что изгиб воды - залив; bend (изгиб ван) - тоже залив.
Первоначальное значение - излучина водотока.
① Место изгиба потока воды: вода ~ 1 река ~.
②Часть океана, которая простирается в сушу: Порт ~ "Бохай ~." Остановка корабля: Поставьте корабль ~ у моста.
~ Поток ~ Бо ~ Танган ~ Море ~ Песок ~ Тайвань ~
залив
Пока пока
wān
I сущ.
1) залив, бухта, гавань
大连湾 Даляньская (Дайренская) бухта
2) излучина, извилина
河湾 излучина реки; лиман
银湾 Серебряная излучина, Млечный Путь
II гл.
1) становиться на якорь; отшвартовываться; пришвартовывать
去芦花荡中湾住 пришвартоваться на оз. Лухуадан
湾船 пришвартовывать судно
2) вм. 弯 (сгибаться; сгибать)
III прил.
см. 弯 (дугообразный, извилистый)
Radicals: 氵, 赤, 弓  (tsunami, red, bow)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami dug out a chunk of the land and now it looks like a big red bow. It's a gulf now!
Picture all the famous gulfs you learned about in geography class. Most of them look like someone pressed a bow into them and dug out the land. (And just imagine they're red because the earth is bleeding, making the sand red.)
Reading Mnemonic
How many tsunamis does it take to make a gulf? Just one (わん). If there were more, then no land would be left behind. It would all be taken into the sea.
Watch one tsunami come in and cut out a chunk of land, leaving behind a big, red gulf.
